description: Details required by Condition 1 (scheme of noise insulation/reduction) of Planning Permission 19/01003/PNRR (Change of use from financial and professional services (Class A2) to residential (Class C3))
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and the condition, as noted above, can be discharged.

The description on your proposal gives the impression the application is for a single storey porch extension - which is shown as being correct on your submitted plans.However there is a single storey rear extension which is also show on your plans, and this will need to be amended accordingly on your application submission.

Your attention is drawn to the need to comply with the relevant provisions of the Building Regulations, the Building Acts and other related legislation. These cover such works as - the demolition of existing buildings, the erection of a new building or structure, the extension or alteration to a building, change of use of buildings, installation of services,  underpinning works, and fire safety/means of escape works. Notice of intention to demolish existing buildings must be given to the Council's Building Control Service at least 6 weeks before work starts. A completed application form together with detailed plans must be submitted for approval before any building work is commenced.
